summary.para: Retrieves the number of axes set on the format.

returns.para: The number of axes set on the format.

summary.para: Retrieves the list of font axis values on the format.

param.name: fontAxisValues
param.para: A pointer to an array of DWRITE_FONT_AXIS_VALUE structures into which GetFontAxisValues writes the list of font axis values. You're responsible for managing the size and the lifetime of this array. Call to determine the size of array to allocate.

param.name: fontAxisValueCount
param.para: The maximum number of font axis values to write into the memory block pointed to by fontAxisValues.

returns.para: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

summary.para: Sets the automatic font axis options.

returns.para: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.

summary.para: Sets values for the font axes of the format.

param.name: fontAxisValues
param.para: A pointer to an array containing a list of font axis values. The array should be the size (the number of elements) indicated by the fontAxisValueCount argument.

param.name: fontAxisValueCount
param.para: The number of font axis values contained in the fontAxisValues array.

returns.para: If the function succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULTerror code.
